title: Teacher-Led Educational Pathway Design for Science Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Science Concepts and Fundamental Proficiency in Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: A structured science education pathway for professional learners to improve learning outcomes and attitudes. Utilizes smartphone-based supplementary materials in non-PC environments.

learning_goals: Explain science concepts related to energy resources (e.g., renewable energy principles, energy conversion efficiency) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Design methods to effectively integrate informal educational resources (e.g., online museum materials) into school curricula through teacher-guided educational pathway (TGEP) activities.
Improve positive attitudes toward science learning and online museum learning by 15% or more in pre-post surveys.

resources: Energy Education Kit Provided by Science Museum Collaborators
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
